Click the 'K' icon labeled "酷狗音乐" to launch the music application.
Click the element with the Chinese text '跳过' in the upper right corner of the screen.
Tap the "X" icon at the top right to close the "限时免费播放中，开通会员享受千万曲库" popup window.
Click outside the membership options popup to close it and return to the main interface.
Click the "我的金币 300 >" button to view the account balance.
